name: Generation Zero: Bikes
summary: You can now traverse the streets, forests, and coasts of Östertörn with a sparkling new bicycle, dodging machines as you go. Not only will you be able to cross greater distances more efficiently, but you will also be able to utilize these handy bikes as strategic tools to lure machines to your ambush location. Just remember, you are not immune to the spray of bullets or rockets that head your way once an enemy spots you.
